TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit HwndSourceParameters extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 包含用於利用 建構函式建立 物件的參數。

span.span: Contains the parameters that are used to create an object using the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個結構只用於物件建構函式呼叫。This structure is used only in the object constructor call. 其值由這個結構所建立的屬性不會直接顯示在執行個體時建構。The properties whose values are established by this structure are not directly exposed on instances when an is constructed. 不過，值結構通常會影響一般[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]屬性，例如 「 高度 」 和 「 寬度 」 可能會存在於特定的裝載物件及其[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]。However, the values of the structure typically affect general [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] properties such as "Height" and "Width" that might exist in specific hosted objects and their [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不建立此結構，使用預設 （無參數） 建構函式的執行個體。Do not construct instances of this structure using the default (parameterless) constructor. 執行個體所建立的預設建構函式會導致無法指派(即使是可設定的屬性會出現)。An instance that is created by the default constructor results in that cannot be assigned a (even though the property appears to be settable). 如果這類執行個體做為參數套用建構函式，所產生的無法顯示視窗。If such an instance is applied as the parameters for an constructor, the resulting cannot display a window.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 請勿對 使用預設建構函式；請參閱＜備註＞。

span.span: Do not use the default constructor for ; see Remarks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 不建立此結構，使用預設 （無參數） 建構函式的執行個體。Do not construct instances of this structure using the default (parameterless) constructor. 執行個體所建立的預設建構函式會導致無法指派(即使是可設定的屬性會出現)。An instance that is created by the default constructor results in that cannot be assigned a (even though the property appears to be settable). 如果這類執行個體做為參數套用建構函式，所產生的無法顯示視窗。If such an instance is applied as the parameters for an constructor, the resulting cannot display a window.

span.span: The window's name.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified window name.

span.span: The window's height, in pixels.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified window name and initial size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請勿針對傳遞 0 （零）`width`或`height`參數。Do not pass 0 (zero) for either the `width` or `height` parameters. 雖然此方法最後會成功，即使您將 0 傳遞，就會發生顯著的效能負面影響。Although the method eventually succeeds, even if you do pass 0, a significant performance penalty occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AcquireHwndFocusInMenuMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值決定是否在建立 時，為包含 WPF 的視窗取得 Win32 焦點。

span.span: to acquire Win32 focus for the WPF containing window when the user interacts with menus; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AdjustSizingForNonClientArea { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否包含要調整的非工作區大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the nonclient area for sizing.

value.span: 如果配置管理員調整大小邏輯應包括非工作區則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the layout manager sizing logic should include the nonclient area; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會將此參數設定為`true`一部分就內部而言，使用此結構時其[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]視窗建立處理程序。The class sets this parameter to `true` when using this structure internally, as part of its [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] window-creation process.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasAssignedSize As Boolean
public: property bool HasAssignedSize { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示是否已指派大小。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a size was assigned.

value.span: 如果已指派視窗大小則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the window size was assigned; otherwise, .

value.span: 除非結構是使用提供的高度和寬度所建立 (這種情況下，該值為 )，否則會預設為 。

span.span: The default is , unless the structure was created with provided height and width, in which case the value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指派的大小，視窗會有預設的大小。If a size was not assigned, the window has the default size. 呼叫或設定或所有使這個屬性被`true`。Calls to or setting or all result in this property being `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Height { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示視窗的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the height of the window.

value.span: 視窗的高度 (以裝置像素為單位)。

span.span: The height of the window, in device pixels.

value.span: 預設值為 1。

span.span: The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於大部分這些方法會採用矩形螢幕區域量值中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，您指定此視窗大小以裝置像素為單位，不一般裝置獨立單位。Unlike most methods that take rectangle screen-region measures in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], you specify this window size in device pixels, not the typical device-independent units. 如果您需要調整您的視窗，其內容的大小，設定至`true`。If you need to size your window to its content, set to `true`. 請勿設定設為 0 （零）。Do not set to 0 (zero). 這樣做會在轉譯顯著的效能負面影響。Doing so incurs a significant performance penalty in rendering.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Interop::HwndSourceHook ^ HwndSourceHook { System::Windows::Interop::HwndSourceHook ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Interop::HwndSourceHook ^ value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the message hook for the window.

value.span: 視窗的訊息勾點。

span.span: The message hook for the window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此訊息攔截程序已啟用之前`CreateWindow`稱為使它收到所有的視窗建立訊息。This message hook is enabled before `CreateWindow` is called so that it receives all the window creation messages.

value.span: 預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks WPF 會自動嘗試將焦點還原至視窗，除非設。WPF automatically tries to restore focus to the window unless is set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetSize (int width, int height);

Public Sub SetSize (width As Integer, height As Integer)
public: void SetSize(int width, int height);

param.name: width
param.span: 視窗的寬度 (以裝置像素為單位)。

span.span: The width of the window, in device pixels.

param.name: height
param.span: 視窗的高度 (以裝置像素為單位)。

span.span: The height of the window, in device pixels.

summary.span: 設定用於 視窗大小的值。

span.span: Sets the values that are used for the window size of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於大部分這些方法會採用矩形螢幕區域量值中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，裝置像素為單位，而非在一般裝置無關的單位，指定這個視窗大小。Unlike most methods that take rectangle screen-region measures in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], you specify this window size in device pixels, not in the typical device-independent units. 如果您需要調整您的視窗，其內容的大小，設定至`true`。If you need to size your window to its content, set to `true`. 請勿針對傳遞 0 （零）`width`或`height`參數。Do not pass 0 (zero) for either the `width` or `height` parameters. 雖然此方法最後成功即使您將 0 傳遞，就會發生效能帶來負面影響。Although the method eventually succeeds even if you do pass 0, a substantial performance penalty occurs.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 的父視窗在配置階段是否應視為視窗的非工作區。

span.span: if parent windows of the should be considered the non-client area of the window during layout passes.; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the should receive window messages raised by the message pump via the .

value.span: 如果 應該會收到訊息幫浦透過 所引發的視窗訊息，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the should receive window messages raised by the message pump via the ; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設是 ，如果 對應至最上層視窗；否則預設是 。

span.span: The default is if the corresponds to a top-level window; otherwise, the default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UsesPerPixelOpacity { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會宣告是否遵守來源視窗內容之每像素的不透明度。

span.span: Gets a value that declares whether the per-pixel opacity of the source window content is respected.

value.span: 如果使用每個像素的不透明度則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if using per-pixel opacity; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由啟用每個像素的不透明度，系統不會再繪製非工作區。By enabling per-pixel opacity, the system no longer draws the non-client area. 在桌面上繪製視窗時使用的不透明度 (它代表最終呈現步驟並不會出現參與者屬性值這類)。The opacity is used when the window is drawn on the desktop (it represents a final rendering step and does not appear as a contributor to property values such as ). 僅適用於最上層視窗。 applies only to top-level windows.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UsesPerPixelTransparency { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會宣告是否遵守來源視窗內容之每像素的不透明度。

span.span: Gets a value that declares whether the per-pixel transparency of the source window content is respected.

value.span: 如果使用個別像素透明度，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if using per-pixel transparency; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Width { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示視窗的寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the width of the window.

value.span: 視窗寬度 (以裝置像素為單位)。

span.span: The window width, in device pixels.

value.span: 預設值為 1。

span.span: The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於大部分這些方法會採用在矩形螢幕區域度量[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，裝置像素為單位，而非在一般裝置無關的單位，指定這個視窗的大小。Unlike most methods that take rectangle screen region measures in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], you specify this window's size in device pixels, not in the usual device-independent units. 如果您需要調整您的視窗，其內容的大小，設定至`true`。If you need to size your window to its content, set to `true`. 請勿設定設為 0 （零）。Do not set to 0 (zero). 這樣做會在轉譯的大幅效能帶來負面影響。Doing so incurs a substantial performance penalty in rendering.

value.span: 預設為 0 (沒有視窗類別樣式)。

span.span: The default is 0 (no window class style).

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 不建立此結構，使用預設 （無參數） 建構函式的執行個體。Do not construct instances of this structure using the default (parameterless) constructor. 執行個體所建立的預設建構函式會導致無法指派(即使是可設定的屬性會出現)。An instance that is created by the default constructor results in that cannot be assigned a (even though the property appears to be settable). 如果這類執行個體做為參數套用建構函式，所產生的無法顯示視窗。If such an instance is applied as the parameters for an constructor, the resulting cannot display a window.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int WindowStyle { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定視窗的樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style for the window.

value.span: 視窗樣式。

span.span: The window style.

value.span: 請參閱[CreateWindowEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=98462)樣式位元的完整清單的函式。

span.span: See the [CreateWindowEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=98462) function for a complete list of style bits.

value.span: Defaults: WS_VISIBLE, WS_CAPTION, WS_SYSMENU, WS_THICKFRAME, WS_MINIMIZEBOX, WS_MAXIMIZEBOX, WS_CLIPCHILDREN

span.span: Defaults: WS_VISIBLE, WS_CAPTION, WS_SYSMENU, WS_THICKFRAME, WS_MINIMIZEBOX, WS_MAXIMIZEBOX, WS_CLIPCHILDREN

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，建立結構時，會設定位元： WS_VISIBLE;WS_CAPTION;WS_SYSMENU;WS_THICKFRAME;WS_MINIMIZEBOX;WS_MAXIMIZEBOX;WS_CLIPCHILDREN。By default, the following bits are set when the structure is created: WS_VISIBLE; WS_CAPTION; WS_SYSMENU; WS_THICKFRAME; WS_MINIMIZEBOX; WS_MAXIMIZEBOX; WS_CLIPCHILDREN. 對於標準的視窗中，您必須設定 WS_CLIPCHILDREN 位元。For a standard window, you must set the WS_CLIPCHILDREN bit. 這個樣式位元會強制執行在程式碼本身。如果您省略設定此旗標，WPF 會將它加入至您提供任何值。This style bit is enforced in the code itself; if you omit to set this flag, WPF adds it to whatever value you provide.
